column1: 70389815$Amazing Time Ticket$$SPELL$$$$$$$$$Quick-Play$$$Pay 800 LP; apply this effect
column2: depending whose turn it is. ● Your turn: Add 1 "Amazement" card from your Deck to your hand. ● Your opponent's turn: Set 1 "Attraction" Trap directly from your Deck. It can be activated this turn. You can only activate 1 "Amazing Time Ticket" per turn.$$$$$
